bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition of an uncomfortable feeling of distension and pain in the throat and esophagus blocked by some item. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry lou gu 螻蛄：主產難，出肉中刺， 潰癰腫，下哽噎，解毒，除惡瘡 , “It controls difficult birth, eliminates thorns from one’s flesh, opens obstruction-illnesses and swelling; brings down choking from gullet occlusion , dissolves poison, and removes malign sores”.

② Illness Sign identical with ye sai 噎塞② , gullet occlusion with blockage. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tuan 猯 quoting Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 28: 胸中忽然或哽入咽，怵怵如蟲行 , “Suddenly in the chest there may be choking because [something] has entered the throat. This is as startling as if bugs/worms were moving there”. writes: 胸中哽噎，怵怵如 蟲行 , “ Choking from gullet occlusion in the chest; this is as startling as if bugs/ worms were moving there”.
